lyrics:
14 contributorsthis is such a pity lyricsverse 1
how is your heart little darling i didnt mean to get so mad
let me just hold you closely how did things get so bad

prechorus
i know how to pick on you you pushed me over the edge
we caused so much agony we cant seem to move ahead

chorus
this is such a pity we should give all our love to each other
not this hate that destroys us destroys us
this is such a pity this is a pity

verse 2
what kind of future will we have will we ever find peace
everybody thinks were crazy theyre about to call the police

prechorus
i dont want to be a chump you think im a fascist pig
right now everything is black i dont think well ever give

chorus
this is such a pity we should give all our love to each other
not this hate that destroys us destroys us
this is such a pity this is a pity
see weezer liveget tickets as low as 225you might also likeguitar solo

chorus
this is such a pity we should give all our love to each other
not this hate that destroys us destroys us
this is such a pity this is a pity
this is such a pity we should give

outro
we should give all our love destroys us
all our love destroys us all our love destroys us
all our love destroys us all our love destroys us
all our love destroys us5embed
